'''18w07b''' is the nineteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on February 15, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w07a|February 15, 2018}}</ref>.

== Additions ==
* Added the block [[tag]] <code>minecraft:waterlogged</code>.
* Added the block and item tags: <code>minecraft:rails</code>, and <code>minecraft:sand</code>.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Bubble column]]s'''
* Reduced upward bubble column item movement speed<ref>{{bug|MC-125473}}</ref>.

'''[[Dried kelp block]]s'''
* Are now flammable.

=== Items ===
'''[[Turtle Scute|Scute]]'''
* Renamed "Turtle Shell Piece" to "Scute".

=== Mobs ===
'''Spawning'''
* Mobs are no longer able to spawn or replenish their breath in [[kelp]] and [[sea grass]].

'''[[Turtle]]s'''
* Breeding now requires [[sea grass]] instead of [[raw cod]].<ref>{{bug|MC-125498}}</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
* Oxygen no longer regenerates instantly when the player exits [[water]].
